message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I think you'll find it's a game-changer in your field. I'm willing to let it go for $1200000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $900000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $1100000. This is the best price I can do at this time.
I'm still very interested in the product, but $1100000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $950000. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $1050000. This is as low as I can go.
I'm really close to my budget, but $1050000 is still a bit too high. I'm willing to go up to $980000. Can you meet me at that price?
